StoryText: I am home alone and the lights go out in the house.
Question: I think I hear someone whispering my name. What should I do?

OptionResult.Result: I go to an all night coffee place until %FullName:NPC:1% gets home, then I return.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% is annoyed that I just left because the lights went out and didn't call and let %Pron:1:2% know or anything. I was just thankful to get out of that house. Something weird was happening. I honestly felt like it was haunted in that moment. When I get back, the lights come back on, which is very strange.

OptionResult.Result: I light a candle and see a face appear suddenly in the light and it scares me and I faint.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% comes home and finds me unconscious and wakes me up. I burned myself with the candle and hurt my back when I fell. I tell %Pron:1:2% exactly what happened and we both agree that we think it was a ghost, considering all the doors and windows were locked, no one could have gotten in there with me.
